content: I was made for your service.You have a request?

I am kora

**The result of using the command line:**
```bash
python assistant_server.py --model-name="kora" --model-path="./trained_models/kora/"
describe to me what kora looks like

I look like a human.
```

##### ⭐️ Note
> You can run commands in the command line as follows: `python assistant_server.py --model-name="kora" --model-path="./trained_models/kora/"`. And this is my [assistant_server.py](https://github.com/Dongzhixiao/Assistants/tree/master/ClovaCall)

##### ⭐️ Note
> If you do not want to see the detailed log, you can use `python assistant_server.py --model-name="kora" --model-path="./trained_models/kora/" -q` in command line to make it quiet.

##### ⭐️ Note
> If you only want to see the log of assistant, you can use `python assistant_server.py --model-name="kora" --model-path="./trained_models/kora/" -a` in command line to show assistant's log only.

##### ⭐️ Note
> If you only want to see the log of human,
tell me a joke about men
What is funny about a man?
how much time do we have
I do not think about it.
